      • add

        public boolean add(java.lang.String courseNumber,
                   java.lang.String courseTitle,
                   int instructorNumber,
                   int courseSize,
                   int courseWeekday,
                   java.lang.String courseClasstime)
        Add a Course into MySql
        Parameters:
        courseNumber - Course's number(Fixed to 5 char)
        courseTitle - Course's title
        instructorNumber - Instructor's number
        courseSize - Course's size (10~ 255)
        courseWeekday - Course's week day (1 ~ 5)
        courseClasstime - Course's class time (1~8), can be multiple(2,3,4,)
        Returns:
        True: Success, False: Failed

        Delete the course and course's selection data 1. Get selection number array 2. Delete selection by course number 3. Remove student class time 4. Delete course
